Transport
of gear
by mules
Mules gear transport

"Lanko expediciones"is a provision of services firm which operates in the Aconcagua Provincial Park.
It is authorized by renewable natural resources management of the province of Mendoza. Besides, it belongs to the chamber of provision of services firms of the park, a body that regulates the way in which the enterprises work, so you can trust them your personal   equipment  or  the  one

of the whole expedition. For some years, transport of gear by mules has been one of our main activities, that is why we understand and attend all the requirements and concerns of our costumers in this such important aspect of the ascent as the logistics of preparing of gear.
Our firm offers mules, horses and own infrastructure, that´s why we are able to guarantee your transported gear will be completely safe. Mule drivers are "gauchos" who are experts on the area, they carry out a very important task, to transport on time and in perfect conditions your gear towards the different base camps of the mountain.

  Our services:
• Round-trip transport of gear, to all intermediate and base camps of the mountain.
• We have permanent staff in Mendoza, in our center of operations located in Los Penitentes ski resort (10 minutes before the entrance of the park), in Plaza de Mulas and in Plaza Argentina. They are connected simultaneously by radio, they take care of receiving your expedition and marking all the arrangements to transport your gear wherever you require it.
•Transport of people, in mules, round-trip to the different base camps of Aconcagua.
• Rescue and evacuation of people.
 Included additional services:
• Assistance for obtaining of climbing or trekking permits.
  • Gear insurance.
• Transfer: from the hotel or shelter in Penitentes or Puente de Inca towards the entrance of the park, (normal route, Horcones or via Polish Glacier, Punta de Vacas).
•Depósito: in Mendoza, Penitentes, Plaza de Mulas and Plaza Argentina. You leave there all the things you don´t need while climbing.
• Gear storage: durante toda la expedición podrá tener contacto con cualquiera de los campos base.
  • Radial communication: you will be able to contact either of the base camps during the expedition.
